tool_description: Cryptocurrency prices and charts. Free access to current data for Bitcoin and thousands of altcoins.
name: Binance
title: Binance

api_list.name: 24hr Ticker Price Change Statistics
api_list.description: 24 hour rolling window price change statistics. Careful when accessing this with no symbol.

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: If the symbol is not sent, tickers for all symbols will be returned in an array.

api_list.name: Current Average Price
api_list.description: Current average price for a symbol.

api_list.name: Compressed/Aggregate Trades List
api_list.description: Get compressed, aggregate trades. Trades that fill at the time, from the same order, with the same price will have the quantity aggregated.

optional_parameters.name: endTime
optional_parameters.description:
Timestamp in ms to get aggregate trades until INCLUSIVE.

- If startTime and endTime are sent, time between startTime and endTime must be less than 1 hour.
- If fromId, startTime, and endTime are not sent, the most recent aggregate trades will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: startTime
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp in ms to get aggregate trades from INCLUSIVE.

optional_parameters.name: fromId
optional_parameters.description: id to get aggregate trades from INCLUSIVE.

api_list.name: Order Book
Exchange Information
api_list.description: Current exchange trading rules and symbol information

optional_parameters.name: permissions
optional_parameters.description:
Required STRING or JSON array.

Examples:

- `SPOT`
- `[\"MARGIN\",\"LEVERAGED\"]`

api_list.name: Kline/Candlestick Data
api_list.description:
Kline/candlestick bars for a symbol.
Klines are uniquely identified by their open time.

optional_parameters.name: startTime
optional_parameters.description: If startTime and endTime are not sent, the most recent klines are returned.

api_list.name: Recent Trades List
Check Server Time
api_list.description: Test connectivity to the Rest API and get the current server time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://binance43.p.rapidapi.com/time"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binance43.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://binance43.p.rapidapi.com/time"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binance43.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Symbol Order Book Ticker
api_list.description: Best price/qty on the order book for a symbol or symbols.

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: If the symbol is not sent, bookTickers for all symbols will be returned in an array.

api_list.name: Symbol Price Ticker
api_list.description: Latest price for a symbol or symbols.

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: If the symbol is not sent, prices for all symbols will be returned in an array.
